entities.name: krebach
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who works for the Black family and has a complex relationship with them. He is bound by enchantments that prevent him from betraying his masters, but he also has a tendency to reveal information that seems trivial to others.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is the mother of Draco Malfoy and is mentioned as someone who received information from Kreacher. She is not described in detail in this passage.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who is mentioned as being the master of Kreacher. He is also mentioned as caring deeply about Harry and being unable to think of banning Kreacher from repeating certain information.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a character who is mentioned as someone who would find the information given by Kreacher valuable. He is not described in detail in this passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character who is mentioned as being cared about deeply by Sirius and is also the subject of conversation between Dumbledore and Harry.

relationships.description: Kreacher works for Sirius and is bound by enchantments that prevent him from betraying his master.
Kreacher gives information to Narcissa, which she finds valuable.
